name: Binary Ninja Ollama Enhanced
description: Enhanced version of Binary Ninja Ollama using requests library, with additional analysis features
longdescription: This is an enhanced fork of the original Binary Ninja Ollama plugin by Austin Haggard. This version replaces the ollama library with requests for better compatibility, and adds new features for function explanation and vulnerability analysis. See https://github.com/dan1t0/binaryninja-ollama-enhanced for full description.
